name: Thieffy Free
description:
THIEFFY FREE

You're a secret agent and you have to get important informations from enemy bases ! Your name is Thieffy, and you need to be smart, fast and sly!

  • STEALTH!

    • Smart robots, lasers, surveillance cameras and more!

  • Hide yourself in the shadow!

    • Go and move objects, hide yourself behind them and activate timers!

  • SECRET BASES

    • Each mission has a different location, and 15 levels. Higher is the level and the mission, harder is the difficulty.

    Only pro players can reach the last one, and what about you ? Can you do it ?

    (In this version, you can play 20 levels. The paid version will be available on the 2/16 and will have 90 levels and more, and only for 1€! Worth it!)
